statements: SELECT * FROM patient_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_profiles WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth;
SELECT full_name, email FROM patient_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY full_name;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM patient_profiles WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY full_name;
SELECT * FROM patient_profiles WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_profiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT email, medical_history FROM patient_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' AND phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT patient_id, full_name, date_of_birth, email FROM patient_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS gender_count FROM patient_profiles GROUP BY gender;
SELECT * FROM patient_profiles;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patient_profiles ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_history WHERE appointment_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM patient_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM patient_profiles JOIN medical_history ON patient_profiles.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender, address FROM patient_profiles WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, appointment_date FROM patient_profiles JOIN medical_history ON patient_profiles.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, prescription FROM patient_profiles INNER JOIN medical_history ON patient_profiles.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_profiles JOIN medical_history USING (patient_id) WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patient_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT psychiatrist_name, specialization FROM telepsychiatrists ORDER BY psychiatrist_name;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis = 'Anxiety';
SELECT patient_name, gender, contact_number FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;

SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Depression%' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT p.patient_name, m.diagnosis, t.specialization FROM patients p JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN telepsychiatrists t ON m.diagnosis = t.specialization;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis = 'Anxiety';
SELECT patient_id, date, type FROM appointments WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, diagnosis, doctor FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT patient_id, date, time, doctor FROM appointments WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Johnson' AND type = 'Follow-up' ORDER BY date ASC, time ASC;
SELECT psychiatrist_id, name, specialization, location FROM telepsychiatrists WHERE specialization = 'Child Psychiatry'
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, reason FROM appointments WHERE status='Scheduled';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_history, medications FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob, gender, address FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, reason, status FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, medications FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%';
SELECT psychiatrist_name, specialization FROM telepsychiatrists WHERE specialization='Child Psychiatry';

SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time, reason, status FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE status='Completed' ORDER BY appointment_date, appointment_time ASC;
